name: WELLNESS FOUNDATION
goal:
Wellness Foundation's mission is to improve the quality of life of people through the dissemination of Wellness, the lifestyle that combines healthy and balanced diet, regular physical exercise and a positive mental approach to life.
The task of the Foundation is to create the social and cultural conditions that enable people to make life choices directed to the prevention of main chronic diseases .
For this reason Wellness Foundation works with public institutions, at all levels, to ensure that the policies put in place by national governments or by the Community institutions should be increasingly meet the needs of health and prevention of citizens.
interests: Consumers, Culture, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: Wellness Foundation is deeply interested in the European Commission "Strategy on nutrition, overweight and obesity-related health issued", in the "European Innovation Partnership on Ative and Healthy Aging", in teh "European Reference Networks" and in the "Third EU Health Programme" as part of the "EU Health Strategy", particularly referring to the prevention of chronic diseases and the creation of supportive environmets to healthy lifestyles.
